demoExpired.title: __Demo Expired
demoExpired.canUpgrade: __Thanks for trying the Sandstorm Demo! Your demo account has expired. If you'd like to continue using Sandstorm and make your data permanent, please sign in.
demoExpired.cannotUpgrade: __Thanks for trying the Sandstorm Demo! Your demo account has expired.

demoModal.header: __Sandstorm is a self-hostable web productivity suite.
demoModal.withoutAppDemo: __with all the apps you need in one place.
demoModal.explanation:
__

Sandstorm makes it easy to run apps on your own server. In addition to improving privacy and control, this brings Open Source apps to a wide audience.
demoModal.securityOverview:
__

Sandstorm is also ridiculously secure. If security interests you, check out Sandstorm's security model overview.

signup.title: __Claim Invite

signedUp.keyIsUsedWithOrigin: __You're all signed up! Now go install some apps.
signedUp.keyIsNotUsed: __It looks like you already have an account, so you don't need this signup key.

signup.keyIsUsed: __Sorry, this signup key has already been used.
signup.signInGuide: __First, you have to sign in. Click "Sign in" in the upper-right.
signup.invalidKey: __Sorry, this is not a valid signup key.

uploadTest.title: __Upload test page
uploadTest.explanation: __This page is intended for use by the test scripts.

isPaid.title: __Get up to 30 GB of free space when your friends share on Oasis!
isPaid.explanation: __For each friend that creates a sharing link, we'll reward you with 2 GB.

isNotPaid.title: __Get unlimited grains & up to 2 GB of free space when your friends share on Oasis!
isNotPaid.explanation: __For each friend that creates a sharing link, we'll reward you with 50 MB. You'll also get unlimited grains.

howTo.title: __Sharing is referring
howTo.explanation: __To get started, open any grain and click Share access.

getStart.step1: __You share a grain with your friend (who isn't already an Oasis user).
getStart.step3: __Your friend shares a grain with any other person (including you).

status.title: __Your referrals & status
status.explanation: __Once you send a sharing link out, people will appear in this list after they sign in.

pending.title: __Still needs to share
pending.explanation: __Tell these people to make a grain and share it with you. You must actually view the grain they shared with you!

finePrint.title: __The fine print
finePrint.warningWithAccountLink: __Your referral bonus lasts until 1 year after the referral. The terms of this referral program may change without warning; however, such changes will not affect bonuses you have already received. If you need even more space, upgrade your account.
finePrint.explanation: __Paid subscribers can get up to 30 GB of free storage, 2 GB per person they refer, in addition to the storage from their account level. Free account holders can earn unlimited grains and 50 MB of free storage per person they refer, up to 2 GB total.

intro.explanation: __Sandstorm.io is an open source hosting platform for personal/private instances of web apps. Users can upload and install arbitrary software through a simple app-store-like web interface. In addition to better privacy, this is the only way to make Open Source web apps viable.
intro.unofficialWarning: __WARNING: This server is running an unofficial build of Sandstorm which may contain modifications not reviewed by the developers.

corporate.title: __Corporate sponsors
corporate.explanation: __These companies contributed heavily to Sandstorm's crowdfunding campaign.

individual.title: __Key indivisual sponsors
individual.explanation: __These individuals contributed heavily to Sandstorm's crowdfunding campaign.

dependencies.title: __Third-party works used
dependencies.explanation: __These works are copyright the respective authors and used under the terms of the respective licenses.

copyright.title: __Copyright
copyright.license: __The Sandstorm implementation is copyright by Sandstorm Development Group, Inc. and contributors. The implementation is licensed under the Apache License 2.0.
copyright.trademark: __"Sandstorm" and the Sandstorm logo are trademarks of Sandstorm Development Group, Inc., and may not be used to advertise derivative works nor commercial services without written consent from Sandstorm Development Group, Inc.

grainView.notFoundWithId: 找不到 ID 為 %s 的沙粒。
grainView.openWithWhichIdentity: 您要用哪個身分開啟這顆沙粒？

grainInMyTrash.explanation: 這顆沙粒沈在回收桶裡，您要把他撈回主清單才能重新使用。

grainInOwnersTrash.explanation: 這顆沙粒被擁有者丟進回收桶了，無法使用。

grainOwnerSuspended.explanation: 這顆沙粒的擁有者被停權了，無法使用。

wrongIdentity.explanation: 開啟這個 URL 必須有以下身份：

requestAccess.warnIdentityRevealing: 要求存取權將把您的完整身份告知沙粒擁有者。
requestAccess.waitForApproving: 要求已送出，若獲核准則會以電子郵件通知您。
requestAccess.signInPlease: 若要要求存取權，請先登入。

revokedShareLink.linkRevoked: 非常抱歉，這個連結已經被撤銷。

grainBackupPopup.title: 下載備份檔
grainBackupPopup.warning: 注意！復原這個備份檔會發生的事可能和你想的不一樣。

grainApiTokenPopup.title: 外網金鑰
grainApiTokenPopup.copyForExternalApp: 複製這個金鑰到外部程式中：
grainApiTokenPopup.description: 外網金鑰讓您可以把外部程式（比如手機 App 等）連結到這個應用程式。

whoHasAccessPopup.title: 可存取者
whoHasAccessPopup.noLoggedInUsers: 未曾有已登入的使用者造訪這個連結過。

emailInviteTab.demoModeAlert: Sharing emails cannot be sent while in demo mode. Create an account to send sharing emails, or get a shareable link instead.

shareableLinkTab.withoutRoles: __Anyone with this link can access the grain.
shareableLinkTab.labelExplanation: __Use a label to remind yourself to whom you sent this unique link.

grainSharePopup.oldSharingModelDescription: __This grain uses the old sharing model. You can share it by copy/pasting the URL from the location bar
grainSharePopup.upgradeDescription: __You can upgrade this grain to the new model, but anyone with whom you shared this grain previously will lose access; you will have to share with them again.
grainSharePopup.signIn: __For more sharing options, please sign in.

share.grainNotFoundWithId: __No grain found with ID %s. Maybe you need to sign in to a different account?
share.signIn: __You must be signed in to grant access to a grain.

mailingListBonusNotificationItem.explanationWithBonus: __Subscribe to our announcement list and get %s bonus storage (1-2 emails per month).

referralNotificationItem.paidUser: __Get up to 30 GB bonus with the
referralNotificationItem.unpaidUser: __Unlimited grains & up to 2 GB bonus with the
